name: Azrellian Asteroid Field
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 39. Theme was Running out of Power.

Documented Keys in the Game

  • Move with L/R Arrow Keys, A/D Keys or Gamepad. You can only move left or right.

Undocumented Keys in the Game

  • Esc key will exit the game.
  • M will mute/unmute the music.
